edits.oldString: Important: PEM is the hallmark symptom of ME/CFS. If present, avoid activities that consistently trigger symptom worsening. Energy management and pacing are key treatment strategies.

PEM-Quest Assessment

Post-Exertional Malaise evaluation - 5 validated questions
